structure.unit: LEVY AND ASSESSMENT OF PROPERTY TAXES

law.history: Repealed 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 255, sec. 283. -- Amended 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 170, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4239j.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Family exemptions; allowance of; how applied; not transferred to tax roll.
